alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 2:25AM CDT until April 12 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hinkle, or 11 miles north of Booneville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Corinth, Iuka, Burnsville, Jumpertown, Glen, Hinkle, Midway, Leedy, Farmington, Rienzi, Kossuth, Oldham, Doskie, Strickland, Blythe Crossing, Collinstown, Biggersville, Jobes, Hazard Switch and Walker Siding. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Memphis. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
